snippet: Refunds are promised to viewers who paid $4.95 each but were preventing from watching live online the beginning of the Bill O'Reilly-Jon Stewart debate on Saturday night.
abstract: Refunds are promised to viewers who paid $4.95 each but were preventing from watching live online the beginning of the Bill O'Reilly-Jon Stewart debate on Saturday night.

headline.main: The Rumble That Wasn't Entirely Live Online
headline.print_headline: Tech Troubles Delay Viewing of ‘The Rumble’
